name: Admin-console release 11.0
description: Introducing Version 11 of the LoginRadius User Admin Console. Please see below for a list of our new features:

ADDED.text: Two Factor Authentication (2FA): Backup Codes are now part of the Admin Console
Login Lockout: you can set if a user fails too many logins if they should be locked out until they complete a captcha or blocked. You can also configure the account lockout treshold
Failed Login Captcha Type: If someone fails too many logins you can now choose which captcha type they should be prompted.
Invalidate Social Profiles: You can now Invalidate Accounts which contains linked social profiles.
Username Case-Sensitivity: Usernames can now have upper case as well as lower case characters.
Team access list: You can now choose which section of the LoginRadius Admin Console your members have access to via roles.
